tactic: apply filterlim_ext_loc with (g := f) in H.
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable g (possible names are: f0 and g0).

original: intros H. apply is_lim_spec in H. unfold is_lim in H. apply filterlim_ext_loc with (g := f) in H. - unfold limit1_in. now apply H. - apply filter_imp; intros y Hy; apply Hy.
